attributes.action: Give Serious consideration to building a New Prison at Denbigh, Denbighshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Office is considering potential sites for a new prison in North Wales.
There is a suitable plot of land in Denbigh. The site of the former North Wales Hospital, Denbigh, would be an ideal "brown field" site for the construction of a new prison.
